title: Deep Neural Network-Based Optimization Design for Improving Collaborative NOMA System Security Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental communication theory, linear algebra, probability theory, and basic Python programming
context.additional_context: Need for mobile-optimized content to accommodate smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model antenna-user selection strategies to enhance security performance in cooperative NOMA systems
Learners can design algorithms to optimize power allocation coefficients and transmission power using deep neural networks (DNN)
Learners can derive analytical expressions for the secrecy outage probability (SOP) and apply them to system performance analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
